body_html: I am using TF1.1. I found this op have no CPU kernel for either Targmax=tf.int32 or Targmax=tf.int64. For GPU (CUDA8 on a Titan X), it has kernel for Targmax=tf.int64, but no kernel for Targmax=tf.int32
body_text: I am using TF1.1. I found this op have no CPU kernel for either Targmax=tf.int32 or Targmax=tf.int64. For GPU (CUDA8 on a Titan X), it has kernel for Targmax=tf.int64, but no kernel for Targmax=tf.int32
body: I am using TF1.1. I found this op have no CPU kernel for either Targmax=tf.int32 or Targmax=tf.int64. For GPU (CUDA8 on a Titan X), it has kernel for Targmax=tf.int64, but no kernel for Targmax=tf.int32
